mapper.sql: id AS id, create_user AS createUser, create_user_name AS createUserName, dept_id AS deptId, dept_name AS departName, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_user_name AS updateUserName, update_time AS updateTime, land_type as landType, category, ownership, plan_compliance as planCompliance, use_strength as useStrength, benefit, desire, is_delete as isDelete, land_area as landArea,land_name as landName, land_no as landNo,remark,land_code as landCode,area_info as areaInfo, area_file_name as areaFileName
mapper.select:
select
from land_low_use.land_info where is_delete=0
and category = #{main.category}
and (dept_id = #{main.deptId} or create_user in ( select user_id from sys_user where dept_id =#{main.deptId}))
and create_time >= CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00')
and create_time <=CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into land_low_use.land_info(id, create_time, create_user, create_user_name, update_time, update_user, update_user_name, land_type, category, ownership, plan_compliance, use_strength, benefit, desire, is_delete, land_area,land_name,dept_id,dept_name,land_no,land_code, remark,area_info,area_file_name) values (#{id}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{createUserName}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateUserName}, #{landType}, #{category}, #{ownership}, #{planCompliance}, #{useStrength}, #{benefit}, #{desire}, #{isDelete}, #{landArea}, #{landName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{landNo}, #{landCode}, #{remark}, #{areaInfo}, #{areaFileName})

insert into land_low_use.land_info(id, create_time, create_user, create_user_name, update_time, update_user, update_user_name, land_type, category, ownership, plan_compliance, use_strength, benefit, desire, is_delete, land_area) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.createUserName}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.updateUserName}, #{entity.landType}, #{entity.category}, #{entity.ownership}, #{entity.planCompliance}, #{entity.useStrength}, #{entity.benefit}, #{entity.desire}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.landArea})

insert into land_low_use.land_info(id, create_time, create_user, create_user_name, update_time, update_user, update_user_name, land_type, category, ownership, plan_compliance, use_strength, benefit, desire, is_delete, land_area) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.createUserName}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.updateUserName}, #{entity.landType}, #{entity.category}, #{entity.ownership}, #{entity.planCompliance}, #{entity.useStrength}, #{entity.benefit}, #{entity.desire}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.landArea})
on duplicate key update id = values(id) , create_time = values(create_time) , create_user = values(create_user) , create_user_name = values(create_user_name) , update_time = values(update_time) , update_user = values(update_user) , update_user_name = values(update_user_name) , land_type = values(land_type) , category = values(category) , ownership = values(ownership) , plan_compliance = values(plan_compliance) , use_strength = values(use_strength) , benefit = values(benefit) , desire = values(desire) , is_delete = values(is_delete) , land_area = values(land_area)
mapper.update:
update land_low_use.land_info
id = #{id},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
create_user_name = #{createUserName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName},
land_type = #{landType},
category = #{category},
ownership = #{ownership},
plan_compliance = #{planCompliance},
use_strength = #{useStrength},
benefit = #{benefit},
desire = #{desire},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
land_area = #{landArea},
